entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wasagaming
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wasagaming 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -32.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
